practice_phrases: 我不再高兴了。
I'm not happy any more.
她不再高兴了。
She's not happy any more.
你为什么不再高兴了？
Why are you not happy any more?
我不知道你为什么不再高兴了。
I don't know why you're not happy any more.
对不起，我不再高兴了。
I'm sorry, I'm not happy any more.
没问题，她不再高兴了。
No problem, she's not happy any more.
当然，我的朋友不再高兴了，一切都好。
Of course, my friend is not happy any more, everything is okay.
我不知道为什么你不再高兴了，但我很感激你帮助我。
I don't know why you're not happy any more, but I'm grateful to you for helping.
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，因为她不再高兴了。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, because she's not happy any more.
当你和他们一起工作时你会知道为什么她不再高兴了，我需要这么早离开。
When you work with them you will know why she's not happy any more, I need to leave so early.
不再了。
Not any more.
我不再说话了。
I don't talk any more.
她不再高兴了。
She's not happy any more.
我不再想要和你们见面了。
I don't want to meet you any more.
我不再需要离开了。
I don't need to leave any more.
没问题，我不再高兴了。
No problem, I'm not happy any more.
当然，我的朋友不再想要帮助我了。
Of course, my friend doesn't want to help me any more.
我不知道为什么你不再高兴了，但一切都好。
I don't know why you're not happy any more, but everything is okay.
这是我朋友不再想要和我们见面的地方，对不起。
This is where my friend doesn't want to meet us any more, I'm sorry.
当你和他们一起工作时你会知道她不再高兴了，我很感激你帮助我。
When you work with them you will know she's not happy any more, I'm grateful to you for helping.
